data.name: Plow the Snow!
data.detailed_description:
Other Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1250090/Housebreaker/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1874980/Ready_for_Riot/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1402650/Birding_Simulator_Bird_Photographer/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1947890/Coffeehouse/

Plow the Snow! is set in post-aposnowlyptic world of Snow Angeles. The Great Blizzard took over every state in United States of Snowmerica, but only one city is still fighting.
Get into your trusty machine - be it an ATV, street cleaner or some other valliant quadricycle and get to work, the future of the city lays in your hands!

Features:


- Customize, fuel and ride multiple machines - not really designated for fighting the snow, but you'll manage



- Explore various environments - clear the maps, get a rating and some prizes with it!



- Play alone or with up to 3 friends in the cooperative mode, the city needs all hands on deck!



- Experience The Great Blizzard - fight its harsh weather and appreciate its beauty...



- ...but don't forget about your grand objective - to eradicate winter from Snow Angeles once and for all!
data.about_the_game:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1402650/Birding_Simulator_Bird_Photographer/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1947890/Coffeehouse/

data.short_description: Fight the cold, plow the snow and rescue Snow Angeles in this arcade 1-4 player co-op experience! Clear the streets, parks, cemeteries, lunaparks and other parts of the city from the effects of The Great Blizzard and become a city hero!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / AMD R9-380
